message.body: Bily says you are more than welcome on his land
i kind of think you are the coolest person i know
This IS maybe the coolest I've ever been, besides when I was in Berlin
And bartending
But getting knocked up by your 23 yr old cute bf and traveling the country w him and my baby while building my arts business Is pretty cool
Go me
Traveling the country w him and his rebel rouser moped crew LOL
We have a little addition to the camper for our two mopeds and he is building a baby sidecar to add to the moped lolol
You're right. This is officially the coolest I've ever been
Also on Friday I'm showing the work of matt Kendig who is a club promoter and does the dolphin and making time etc
He is very 'cool' and it will be a very 'cool' show w lots of turn out and I don't even care bc my life and bf is so much cooler than those dudes
this is amazing

He tried to impress me by negging me and mentioning all the famous people he knows and how popular he was and blaaaa and I was like um I'm busy I got to go take my bf to his mechanic shop for his new crew patch sorry
It was like we had a hipster/scenester walk off
And let's be real I won
He was trying to neg me and flirt w me by being rude to me and seeming cooler than me
And I was like, um whatever, I need to go grab my 23 yr old bf from his rally meet up
I don't care about your 35yr condescending DJ attitude
My bf is cuter than you and nicer
omg omg
omg
love this
ok so i started a new body of work
and I’m really excited by it
yayaya. it’s about algorithmic transparency. so zach and i are going to take/are taking drawings from patents for recommendation algorithms (Facebook, Microsoft, Amazon, etc) are “remixing” them.
i want to talk to you about it but u r too cool
and now ill be ashamed to bring it up over the phone
bc ur life is just too fucking cool
Haha no that is super cool and interesting too!!!
how will you present them? The drawings?
as in, what is the final product or medium you are working in?
well thats the thing
i wanted to wait and see
like what form do they want to be
but zach is working on illustrator and I’m collaging
i was thinking etchings
but i need your
help
with applying to stuff
i just reread your texts. they are so supportive. i want your input

I am work-shopping papers for the students in this graduate class. Writing really is hard. Wtf. These students are people in their 20s and they don't know how to write. Omg. Will flier after I go to class. They need us!
Also by the way. I am more than your designer, I am your best friend and by default it's ok for me to say "our business"
Like I feel like if I say I'm starting a business with you I'd let myself spend more time on the design stuff.
Don't worry I don't want money from u. I just want to mooch off your brilliance
Of course you can say our business !!
Lol god my dad hates Alec so much
He hates the camper idea and thinks it's all Alec making me a homeless personnw no values and a gypsy
He is so tied to the idea that a baby needs a dad w a full time good job and a house and a mortgage and a mom Who has a fake side job
I seriously had no idea my dad was this conservative
Like, why did I go to college then? If my entire role was to land a man who could support me? I didn't realize that was what was expected of me at all

Also he is flipping about how we are just like Romanian gypsies aka trash and I don't want to Totally freak him out by telling him that Alec's family Background is Literally Romanian and Spanish gypsy and that he Loves the idea of being a gypsy
My dad is so mad allllllll the time now and I feel awful but I am not taking Any of his money right now so I don't see why this is even so upsetting to him
He seriously is so mean to Alec it is ridic
I can't believe Alec is being so nice about it
He's SO mean about Alec's moped crew and Constsntly asking him when he's going to graduate highschool
It is seriously really really mean *sigh* that is my life now
It's almost like he Wants to make it so hard for Alec that he breaks up w me
It's like he thinks I'd be better off or something . It is so infuriating
oh just saw your texts

ok my parents have the same traditional conservative values (woman needs to be supported - and MY MOM IS SUPPORTED) it’s ridiculous and VERY SCARY bc they didn’t raise us that way. Like they want us to have careers but also follow our dreams bc a man will save us.
so honestly, i think your father has one point: which is that he loves you and doesn’t want your life to unnecessarily hard. try to remember that
also know that HE WILL COME AROUND AND SUPPORT YOU
he may not approve of one year of your life, but he will support you
if it really bothers you, try NOT cutting him out. but leveling with him.
like take him out for coffee and talk to him in a neutral setting.

remind him that you share his values, and believe in a career. explain to him how you see yourself accomplishing your goals. explain your timeline for him. explain that you love Alec, and you know someday he will too.
give your father a few years
he will come around
*also, just a side note. Dad’s are really really hard to talk to. I know your father is the exception to most rules but dad’s are stubborn and bad listeners. BE PATIENT
repeat main points often
even if they seem annoyed
ahha
Oh joy!
Omg yes tho to your text- what is so scary is that my whole life I was told I was self sufficient and should have my own career
I know!!!
Now suddenly it is... What no! Obv you should find a man who can support you!
Like, wait what?!!!!
Since WHEN
My dad said he felt like he wasted money on my education bc I ended up w someone uneducated
And I was like WHaT
That makes No sense!!'n
Isn't the whole point that since I'm educated, and have potential, I have the CHOIcE and opportunity to be with whomever man I love?!!
Like if I DiDnT have an education or career chance, THeN id be dependent on marrying an educated well earning man
But everyone lies
I feel like the world tells me lies
And they are slowly unraveling
Omg
Welcome to my parents and Hannibal
I thought one of the prizes that I EARNED by studying and working and not getting knocked up at 17,
Was that I could date who ever I wanted!
My dad said something awful like, I sent you to two of the best universities in the world, and you ended up w a high school drop out?
Like wait what, did you send me there so I could find a husband?!!!!!!
Bc I totally missed that memo
Maybe you should have told me that college was a mrs. Degree bc I truly didn't know
This pressure is something I've been dealing with for a while and it's totally fucked up
My dad has never made me feel this way! Also, he never brought it up while Alec and I dated!
Alec came to all our holiday dinners! It's not like I met him yesterday! If he was not Acceptable to be with, why did you wait til I was in love to drop that info on me?!!!
Anyway, he is going to have to get over it
I told him I really thought I'd make enough $ to support Alec if he ended up living in a camper w my baby and his moped crew and traveling lol and my dad was like YOU ARE TUrNInG INtO TrAsH
Like what!?? It'll be awesome. I don't even need his money for this
Alec starts his second job in a few weeks and we will totally be able to put together a few thousand bc I won't be paying rent
oh!!! Alec LoveS the idea of going to hannibals property Lololol.
Yeah. They are totally cool with it.
U can stay as long u want
Bring them weeds
Weed
And they'll be so happy
Oh well duh you know that's all Alec wants
What's scary is that my dad doesn't even know half the stuff about Alec
And he already hates him
And I haven't even ...been honest about it all Hahahahaha
Liiiike I can't tell my dad that Alec has pretty bad anxiety attacks/panic attacks and should be I anti anxiety meds
He had a panic attack at my dads and we had to leave
Like a legit panic attack, the kind where you pass out
Eh so my dad doesn't know that he is def reliant on weed, has anxiety, has a pretty serious sleep disorder
The idea that he is going to shape up and have a career is ludicrous
The idea that he's going to stay home and cook and watch my baby and then kid later on is totally perfect tho
Like he can barely hold the jobs I GET him
omg ingrid i am spreading the word about bonnie so excited
(sorry to change subject - i just got to work).
I’m so obsessed with our company
ok so check your dropbox
there is the website image
i pulled it to the front
of the folder
but it was in there
ill mark in red
also marked in red
is a notepad i designed for you
you can get printed at Fireball
Im not sure about the bottom line
or the red line in general
Oh ok great! I want to pretty up the site
Also SOumya can play with those if she likes i made them in ilustrator
just have her save her changes in a different document
almost down with card
obviously had to redesign
can you just tell me new rates
I also have an amazing idea for front of postcard
a list of editing symbols
instead of writing about art is hard, bonnie can help we give a dictionary of grammatical mark-up
ill show you later when i get back home
￼I’m also thinking more like this for the back
Oooh I like that!
Yeah right!
ok
so here’s my thoughts about Alec
some of that stuff you should just NEVER tell your dad
omg
also i cut two inches off my hair
Haha yeah I will never tell him p
The biggest secret tho that I'll never tell him is that Alec also self harmed when youz
Younger ￼

He's not secretive about it at all either so in steeling myself for the day he is holding our baby and my dad sees the super faint cut arms all up his arm from when he went through his breakup w Anna (that's her name!)
*im

They dated for years and he proposed to her and she then cheated on him w a mutual friend and when he found out through others, he punched through Avery's windshield and ended up in a psych ward (woah!) bc he was acting so crazy and self harming

And he has cut marks from cutting himself the days of their breakup and he said he wanted to die etc. He just recently met up w the dude who she cheated on him w tho! He cut off an entire friend group over it
He apologized to the dude for attacking him in Ny lol after he found out
And they cordially made up and he now cautiously hangs w that group again
(OMG NATE SELF-HARMED TOO)!
OMG SO MUCH SNOW
ingrid be careful driving
omg nate seriously self-harmed its so scary
I think it is more common than we realize
At least he didn't self harm w alcoholism or serious drugs
i know right
alcohol and drugs are scary
Also the whole story makes me feel good actually bc I know Alec takes relationships really seriously . Lol SO seriously
His friends warned me not to break up w him hahaha
When he moved in w me
"He is really sensitive. Don't mess w him"
Lol
Well what more do they want!!!??! I'm having his baby for godssake. It's like I can never win
Oops
Lol wrong text
cute puppty
the puppy not for me>
Cute puppy but she constantly hurls her paws and weight straight on my placenta like a mofo
It's like she knows and she wants to destroy any other cute baby who might usurp her spot
